channel.title: Comments on: User Research Results Recap

item.title: By: User Research Results Part 1: Global Search and Site Search – Off the Shelf
item.dc:creator: User Research Results Part 1: Global Search and Site Search – Off the Shelf
item.description: […] In June and July 2020, the UX Team interviewed a representative set of users from the UCSF community as part of a larger user research initiative. Testing focused on learning more about users’ mental models and behaviors through common user testing methods. For a summary of findings see User Research Recap. […]
item.content:encoded: […] In June and July 2020, the UX Team interviewed a representative set of users from the UCSF community as part of a larger user research initiative. Testing focused on learning more about users’ mental models and behaviors through common user testing methods. For a summary of findings see User Research Recap. […]
